title: Excellent customer service
text: Excellent customer service. Beautiful product, just as pictured. Really happy with the entire process. But quite expensive.

title: Rhinestone horsebit zip…
text: Purchased the  rhinestone horsebit zip tall boots. I love them, glad that I followed my first mind and went up a size making them very comfortable. I suggest go up a size in these boots for a more perfect and comfortable fit.

title: Rainbow did it for me!
text: I gave a four star rating only because I felt that most of the "shipping" time was spent in the warehouse. For almost two days package was still at the warehouse. Otherwise, I would have given a five star rating. Rainbows application is fantastic and very user friendly. Also, their selection is outstanding. Rainbow does stand alone!

title: More clothes from almost famous and…
text: More clothes from almost famous and boom boom quality and affordable pieces  that last and don’t start raising the price or I will shop elsewhere. And it would be nice if you guy sent me a gift card I rock rainbow clothes and you would never know my clothes came from rainbow by the way I style them.Just more quality affordable pieces that can last being  wash more than once or twice.

title: Rainbow Great Deals. Move Quick when you see a Gem
text: I’m a new rainbow shopper and the prices are amazing. If I move quick I can get my size. There has been a few occasions where items sell out fast. I find that the stores have tones of materials but often very small a crowded.  Overall my shopping experience has been great. I will look to use the online platform moving forward.

title: My shopping experience was almost…
text: My shopping experience was almost perfect. I only wish the graphic skirts I bought had been available in regular women sizes. I bought the 1X plus size, but I plan to have the garments altered to make them a size large like I originally wanted.

title: Need to get more quality things
text: I do appreciate your sales but you need to get more quality stuff cuz I know my material very well and I know what would last and hold up but your earrings is at Shein $1.50,and at Temu, also at Fashion Nova the jewelry is much cheaper so sometimes it would be nice to check that out.

title: Coats 4 Kidz
text: I found some beautiful girl's coats at a great price. I work with a nonprofit organization that gives coats free of charge to underpriviledged children in Mississippi. i shop early for the best bargains and you have some fantastic ones. The more I save on a coat, the more I can buy.

title: Good experience
text: Order came fast *shipped to a US address) and the quality of the clothes were what I expected. The small could have been a bit smaller, so maybe have more size ranges. The app such is a pain to use, it just freezes or just doesn't load. Otherwise, happy with the purchases and will be ordering again.

title: I am giving 4 stars as the items have…
text: I am giving 4 stars as the items have not yet been delivered as yet. So far the purchasing experience is very good. The site is user friendly, My purchase was effortless. I was able to find what i was looking for at reasonable prices, i will be shopping again, already started to add more items to my cart.

title: Love the affordable plus sizes!!
text: Love that you have plus sizes at reasonable prices!! However, your search feature often takes us to the wrong items. Also, the way things are laid out is confusing and the pictures and descriptions need to be done better. For example, I need a hoodie with pockets. I ordered a few pieces but sometimes couldn't tell if it has pockets or not?! That's not very helpful.

title: Rainbow impresses with its remarkable…
text: Rainbow impresses with its remarkable affordability. The wide range of products they offer doesn’t compromise on quality despite the budget-friendly prices. I’ve found that their pricing strategy makes it accessible for a diverse audience without sacrificing the value or style of their items.

title: Shopping on line at rainbow.
text: It was very easy shopping on line, I received everything I ordered.The deliver took about a week and the return policy is very easy as well. I find that the garments run small, so be aware when purchasing clothing items.Overall, I enjoyed my shopping experience with Rainbow.

title: I saw what I like and hopefully it will…
text: I saw what I like and hopefully it will fit first and foremost that my order get received in my mail box 9. Gate code to get in is #23 * 1907 I live right side long the way down to the corner. I have issues with resident stealing delivery thank you very much have wonderful bless day.

title: Keeping on with tradition & tecnology…
text: This is my first time buying in your store by Internet we have the store here in P.R. but this was one of my Daughters favorite store and so I picked her and my Grandaughter Christmas gift to be shipped to Florida,I enjoyed the experience and the helped given to me by your Customer Service Rep.

title: Affordable and Cute Merchandise
text: I love the merchandise that Rainbow offers! However, the website and the app can be quite buggy; I had to refresh the app three times before I was able to place my last order. When the technical issues are fixed it will be a much smoother process to order from Rainbow.

title: Most of my purchases were great and…
text: Most of my purchases were great and prices were even better, but the sizing information on the boots I bought was incomplete. Sizing information and chart say 9, but boots say 9/ 39. I donot wear 39, so I had to return. I was so disappointed, because I had purchased it for my birthday.

title: I love your deals I wish u have more…
text: I love your deals I wish u have more online discount codes I deserve it this my third time this month purchasing would have gave 5stars but no give back code

title: The clothes are usually great however…
text: The clothes are usually great however the Rogue shoes are not made for plus size women. I have several that have broken or collapsed after one wear. I would love Rogue information to write them and complain since you guys won't do it.

title: It’s always easy to order from rainbow…
text: It’s always easy to order from rainbow but receiving my order is a different story. FedEx is the worst delivery service and I wish rainbow would find a different carrier. If I don’t receive my package this time I will no longer order from rainbow online. Also free shipping at $35 was wonderful and I wish afterpay was an option instead of the company that’s offered now.

title: Comfy and affordable
text: As a plus size girl in a world made for smaller women, I love having a store that doesn't cost the soul of my first born to shop at. I got 3 pairs of jeggings, I may size up next time they are a little snug and a bit thin, my child said she couldn't see through them. 1 pair of jeans and I'm sold they are soft and fit amazing. 1 pair drawstring cargo pants, I'm tall 5'10 so they are a bit short but I'm going to roll them up at the bottom. 1 shirt soft and form fitting, I would order up if you want it a bit looser. If I order nothing else I will always buy my jeans here.

title: Great selection and pricing
text: Great selection and pricing.  Little bit disappointed that some items not available in my size.Not sure if my card was charged for the full amount or if it processed the "pay in 4" payment structure.  Little bit confused about that process.

title: Navigation was comprehensive and I love…
text: Navigation was comprehensive and I love that I can find items that have sold out in the store. Feedback would be to reduce the spending limit for free delivery or it defeats the purpose of shopping online for items not found in store.

title: Overall I would give 4 out of 5 because…
text: Overall I would give 4 out of 5 because they prices are always great shipping is pretty fast on thing I don’t like is when you put an item in your cart it doesn’t say unavailable until you get ready to check out.

title: No reviews on items in app(?)
text: Maybe I didn’t look close enough but there doesn’t seem to be any reviews on the items, when using the app at least. Otherwise pretty good and easy experience ordering some stuff.

title: Size availability was great
text: Size availability was great! I was able to purchase all of my daughters favorites. I would like to see sizes extended to 4xl for all items offered in plus sizing.

title: Bad service all the way around
text: So I've been shopping at Rainbows stores here in San Antonio since forever I've even shipped on line a few times,but this last time was a hot mess. I ordered 2 things my address on my account as been the same for yrs now. But somehow my order was generated with an address in Philadelphia and my ordered was returned I was so livid because customer service on the phone are as rude as they come even though the mistake was on rainbows side not once was I offered an apology or anything, and in order to reorder my stuff I had to wait till be refunded in which each item was returned separately so that was stupid, 2nd I wasnt even offered a simple sorry let me give you a small discount on your reorder... This is the worst online Custer service I've ever had to deal with shein does a lot better than what this company offers. But please do learn to offer an apology to your shoppers when it's the company's fault. Word of mouth and reviews goes a long way. Needless to say I did reorder what I wanted but I shouldn't have gone through so much hassle because of an error generated by rainbow. But now I'm not sure if I will ever order on line again.

title: I was looking for an item that I had…
text: I was looking for an item that I had bought previously a few years ago. It was a little harder to find them, but I believe I did find the right thing.I like the website because it’s pretty easy and the description of the clothes helps me remember which of the things I’m looking for

title: Good selections
text: I’ve always liked Rainbow Shops, just not the prices so much. Still, the styles and clothing are for me so it’s worth it. I would like to see more of the products I usually buy because the shorts and summer clothing are always sold out in 3/4 of the sizes offered.

title: Your stuff is GREAT at Rainbow!
text: I always like to shop at Rainbow for accessories, shoes and clothes. Get great deals with great selection and variety...very affordable! I love to shop with Rainbow because I am a plus-sized woman and the things that you have really are modern and chic.

title: Lots of options
text: The items were easy to view, there are lots of options, and I can easily find my size. I also appreciate the option of offering multiple pickup locations for orders.

title: I love Rainbow and I love how…
text: I love Rainbow and I love how affordable the prices are. I would love to see more jewelry (specifically bangle bracelets) Please add boot cut jeans and jeans in darker washes. If possible we could use 4x sizes

title: I love shopping on Rainbow but I find…
text: I love shopping on Rainbow but I find lately the clothes aren't that cute, but I still give you all a four based on past shopping experience.

title: Great experience overall but…
text: The plus size section needs a little freshening up, and the check out process isn’t as intuitive when you’re using a gift card as payment, it took a little while to figure out

title: I am not sure that I got my discount…
text: I am not sure that I got my discount with the promo code FOMO please make sure you apply that and deducted from my credit card. Thank you cause I am a regular shopper with rainbow.

title: The clothes are great. Make it easier to find Klarna option.
text: The clothes on the site are great but it was difficult to find the klarna option for payment. I had to click multiple times on the various payment options to find it.

title: most items came in the sizes I needed
text: most items came in the sizes I needed.  8/10 was almost totally out in all the selections I wanted  But I ended up with a sufficient amount of clothes for my daughters regardless

title: The price and style of the clothing is…
text: The price and style of the clothing is superb, but the website does not update well. It lists clothing as available and when you put it in your cart and try to purchase it, it may say "out of stock."

title: My only thing was that if you had the…
text: My only thing was that if you had the merchandise in the store, which I saw it online, I could have just picked it up from the store and not pay for shipping. Because if I see it online, I expect for it to be in the store not having to get it shipped to me. Your store charges more to ship it to your home than to the store pickup.

title: Easy to find online
text: While I like the ease of online shopping I would also like to know if items are available in store near me without having to call each store.

title: I gave a 4 stars because I first had…
text: I gave a 4 stars because I first had gone on rainbowshop.com through Facebook and put items in the cart. When I  later went directly to the website, it had all the items except one in my size; the one was sold out in the color I wanted in my size.

title: It was easy to navigate your system and…
text: It was easy to navigate your system and find what I was looking for.  It also had several variety of shoes in my size which was uncommon for me.  Thank you!

title: I have lymphedema in one arm( swelling…
text: I have lymphedema in one arm( swelling due to mastectomy). It is hard to find tops that fit both arms. I like the option of return to store when ordering online.

title: Shopping was easy the reason I only…
text: Shopping was easy the reason I only gave 4star is because I signed up for email in I never received the 10% off promo code

title: Great prices; cheap clothes
text: Prices are great but the quality is reflective of the pricing. I don't expect these clothes to last more than a couple of seasons, but for these prices, that's OK.

title: Love the items
text: Love the items, but when using a gift card your unable to use complete amount with all taxes so I had to put some items back.

title: Please improve the quality of online shopping…
text: Great but I hate the way in store accessories are not available online like cosmetics strange but true.

title: Payment process…
text: It was good until the Apple Pay wasn’t available unless I logged out my account and continued my purchase as a guest that was annoying.

title: The price point is good
text: The price point is good.  I really appreciate the free shipping after spending a reasonable amount which was $50.  Thanks

title: The employees were very polite and…
text: The employees were very polite and helpful.Was a bit disappointed that the store did not allow access to dressing rooms

title: It was ok
text: I’m a first time customer so I spun the wheel and got 15% off if I signed up for emails. I did and then when I went to order and checkout, I never got a code or email. But I’m getting a tons of emails from your site.

title: The best thing rainbow has done within…
text: The best thing rainbow has done within the past year, was lowered the free shipping price form $75 to $35. One of the best things they've done in awhile. the selection is ok. Just wish there was more clearance items.

title: My First Purchase
text: It was my first time purchasing from Rainbow.com. I don't have any complaints just available sizes. My items arrived & I'm pleased with the purchase.

title: Was able to purchase most of what I…
text: Was able to purchase most of what I liked in the correct sizes. Good assortment. Easy to navigate online.

title: Couldn’t find exactly what I want but…
text: Couldn’t find exactly what I want but hopefully this will be big enough and more comfortable to wear

title: I love shopping at Rainbow Shops…
text: I love shopping at Rainbow Shops however the shipping fee can be a bit too much.

title: I've Ordered In The Past Service Was…
text: I've Ordered In The Past Service Was Good. I'll Take Another Survey When My Order Return On Time.

title: Loyal customer
text: Rainbow is very afordable! I been loyal customer since,  I was a teenager. Rainbow should provide coupons.

title: Because I love shopping at rainbow…
text: Because I love shopping at rainbow Because you can find some nice stuff online

title: I love the choices...and for…
text: I love the choices...and for versatility in my clothes and accessories I can Always count on RAINBOW!!!!

title: Quality jeans - but......
text: I have shopped Rainbow for years, and really like their jeans. But recently there has not been the selection in size 13 jeans as there has been in the past. It's very limited.

title: I loved the shopping experience
text: I loved the shopping experience . I just wish the site had more regular than Plus size.

title: I love shopping with rainbow they keep…
text: I love shopping with rainbow they keep you informed on your purchases

title: I love your jeans
text: I love your jeans. If I take my time I find a lot of hidden gems for a great prices. Thank you for keep us current in style and also at an economical price.

title: It was good and I don’t know if it was…
text: It was good and I don’t know if it was user error or not but every time I looked at something it took me back to the top of the list of the items I was looking at so it was very frustrating but otherwise an overall good experience

title: Need to allow reviews
text: Easy to navigate. Smooth checkout process. It would be great if you could see reviews.

title: Quick and easy shopping
text: Quick and easy shopping. Affordable pricing and stylish designs that cater to all sizes.

title: I wish size xs was available or there…

title: The prices were great…
text: The prices were great and site is easy to maneuver. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because a few of the items I wanted were out of stock.

title: There need to be more updated variety…
text: There need to be more updated variety and choices. Size selections are very limited

title: that you get charge for shipping even it go to the store

title: The fact that they restock quickly

title: Shop at rainbow all the time I like the…
text: Shop at rainbow all the time I like the store and I mostly like it is affordable with the prices and they have very cute thing that on trend and unique items.. great store

title: I love Rainbow..I'm a older woman who…

title: Great Purchase but Need to Know this About Returns
text: Good quality and accurate sizing.  There were 2 drawbacks, though.  The first one was partly my fault.  I had purchased 2 bras.  I was unaware that you could not return certain items, bras being one of them.    I had to keep them, even though they do not fit right. The second drawback was that I did not know that if you send returns back with the pre-addressed label, there is a  deduction of  $7.99 from the amount being returned.  I was under the impression that there were free returns through the mail.  I returned at a store, though, and there were NO problems and the women working were VERY pleasant and helpful.  I felt very comfortable returning the items without any hassle in the store.  If you are confident in what you are purchasing and it isn’t difficult for you to go to a store, I highly recommend Rainbow Shops.  Their clothing is affordable and good quality, as well as “on-trend”!!

text: Shopping at rainbow.com is fun and easy. I like your search engine. It makes it quick and easy to find the items you’re looking for. I also like Rainbow.com multiple payment options. Shopping online can make it difficult to know how an item may fit. I took off a star because I would like to see customer reviews about how the shoes and clothing fit. The items on the wishlist keep changing location. It can be challenging to find some of the more recent additions to the list.

title: Rainbow offers a unique shopping experience
text: Rainbow offers a unique shopping experience online. Their website has trendy fashion clothing at an incredibly low price point. I appreciate the websites ability to bring up different styles that are similar to current searches and suggest matching items for an outfit. In addition, the return process is simply because your items come with a prepaid return label. One area they could possibly improve on would be just modifying their search engines to include more detailed search options.

title: Happy with my selections
text: My experience was great because my size was available in multiple colors, variety is important. I would love to see a better selection in sizes 5x and 6x there's very little too choose from in those sizes.

title: Hello I've really never shop @Rainbow…
text: Hello I've really never shop @Rainbow Shop nice items you can make looks like hundreds bucks outfits I'm a customer online stores too crowded no walking space enjoy online BETTER.

title: Thank you for offering Klarna
text: Thank you for offering Klarna. It was not possible to join your mailing list from the home page of rainbowshops.com so that was disappointing as a friend had indicated that discounts on first orders were possible? I completed my first order and I love how everything I ordered shows up with my confirmation number by email. Thank you for indicating sizes shown on models in photos of items on your website and multiple angles. I was sad many items were not available in my size (M),(L).

title: Fairly good variety
text: Fairly good variety; however, clothing is more geared to the younger consumer. There are not very many choices for the older customer.

title: My honest opinion
text: The site was easy....I just wish there were better choices for boys clothes.....the girls have plenty of cute stuff while the boys stuff looks like Salvation Army style... like y'all said "here you go..it is what it is 🤷🏾‍♀️"

title: Wish there were reviews to assist with…

title: RAINBOW HAS A LOT OF CUTE CLOTHES FOR…
text: RAINBOW HAS A LOT OF CUTE CLOTHES FOR EVERY OCCASION AT REASONABLE PRICES,HOWEVER SOMETIMES THE SIZE IS A LITTLE OFF.A LARGE IS SOMETIMES AN EXTRA LARGE AND A MEDIUM REALLY IS A SIZE LARGE AND THESE ARE U.S AMERICAN SIZES.OFTEN I HAVE TO SIZE DOWN BUT THE CLOTHES ARE REALLY NICE.

title: You finally have an online store!
text: You finally have an online store. You can have lower prices though. There are things in the store that are not online as well, like the various colored tank tops I usually purchase In the stores. Overall, I had a good experience  with the online shopping and plan to do it again.

title: Untitled
text: Some items I wanted wasn't in my size, had to go with others options.  It's hard to order items when work schedule makes it hard. When I come back to cart items are gone or sold out. Great selection on clothes.

title: So far my experience was great
text: So far my experience was great! Found everything I needed and site was easy to navigate. Just waiting on my shipment!

title: I really love the idea that my items…
text: I really love the idea that my items were affordable and of great quality.  The Rainbow shop has many different categories you can choose from to select affordable products. The prices are great, even if you're not buying the items on sale. My delivery date was off,But otherwise I'm satisfied. Thank you!

title: The Online Shopping Process
text: I appreciate that it is remarkable easy to order items on Rainbow Shops online website. What I do not like is that free shipping is not extended to totals up to $25.

title: All my items came in as ordered
text: All my items came in as ordered. I wasn't aware of the store policy that wouldn't accept items for return or exchange by using the order number from the phone. As much as I order from Rainbow I've never had an issue and now I don't think I will continue to do online business with you.

title: They are quick and from what I see good quality.

text: It gives you a variation of similar  products similar to what you're searching.    I can purchase clothing, shoes and accessories to match and then go to kids and pick out a outfit and sandal to match

title: Great for finding JUST the right clothing and accessories!
text: I really enjoy shopping on Rainbow.com, almost as much as I love to browse in the store... But when you have a busy schedule like mine, its great to know that I can get the same great items for the same amazing prices. I only caution that you know exactly what you need, or you'll get more than you originally meant to... but with the savings, how can any fashionista pass these amazing prices by?

title: My go to retailer
text: Rainbow always have cute little outfits and shoes. Always my go to when I need something quickly. Sometime you don't have my size or color but I can get past that. I get my purchase on time and I'm never disappointed when I receive it.

title: Affordable
